001package edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.service;
002
003import edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.model.dto.Authentication;
004import edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.model.dto.MeetingListResponse;
005import edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.model.dto.MeetingParticipantsResponse;
006import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
007import retrofit2.http.Field;
008import retrofit2.http.FormUrlEncoded;
009import retrofit2.http.GET;
010import retrofit2.http.Header;
011import retrofit2.http.Headers;
012import retrofit2.http.POST;
013import retrofit2.http.Path;
014import retrofit2.http.Query;
015
016public interface ZoomAuthProxy {
017
018
019
020  @FormUrlEncoded
021  @POST("oauth/token")
022  @Headers("Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded")
023  Single<Authentication> authenticate(@Header("Authorization") String authorization, @Field("account_id") String accountId, @Field("grant_type") String grantType);
024
025}
026
027
028
